room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: We went to Breakout tonight and did the kidnapping room and it was a lot of fun! Chris was great and helped make it great for us all. We will definitely be going back soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: Did The Kidnapping room for a buddy's birthday and it was so much fun!!! Thank you Jordan for making our experience so much fun! We will definitely be back and hopefully I'll be able to talk work into a team building event!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: The Kidnapping was an awesome experience!! Our game master, Andrew was wonderful!! A must try, even though we didn't breakout, it will be something for us to remember for a long time!! Thank you for this!!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: Had so much fun! It was just my daughter and me for a mother daughter date. We did the Kidnapped experience and didn't make it out but still had a blast. The experience was so well put together and clever. Our game master Max was wonderful and the facility was clean and well maintained. Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Greensboro in Greensboro
review: If we had only 5 more minutes! We (3 teens and an adult) did The Kidnapping room and what fun! From being handcuffed and blindfolded to figuring out all those clues it was a barrel of laughs along with really making us use our brains and sleuthing skills. Our game master was very kind with us and she was great about offering clues without giving us too much information.
